thread.title: 13 Joyful Real Wedding Moments That Are Sweet As Can Be
thread.title_full: 13 Joyful Real Wedding Moments That Are Sweet As Can Be

author: Kelsey Borresen
title: 13 Joyful Real Wedding Moments That Are Sweet As Can Be
text:
13 Joyful Real Wedding Moments That Are Sweet As Can Be Congrats, all! ðŸ‘° 02/13/2017 05:26 pm ET Kelsey Borresen Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
Mondays stink but these lovely real wedding photos from our readers are helping us get through the day. 
Check them out, in all their sweetness, below: 1 "Happy wedding, Belvels!" -- Molly McElenney 2 "I had the absolute pleasure of shooting the beautiful couple, Kayla and Victor Holder! Both wanted to have a small, intimate wedding and The La Belle Amour in Tampa, Florida provided the perfect setting." -- Ashley Canay 3 "Congratulations, Erin and Jean! We had a beautiful ceremony at Spring Lake Park gazebo. Their ceremony included a unity wine." -- Andrea Purtell 4 "Kelvin and Fiona's wedding yesterday at Church of St. Theresa." -- Lightedpixels Photography 5 "Anjali and Krish at Shendish Manor, U.K." -- Dino Jeram 6 "Congrats to Amanda and Michael, who tied the knot on this warm weekend in Valdosta, Georgia." -- Christophe Z. 7 "Jesse and Treana Owens married in Sacramento, California." -- Keina Sanchez 8 "Nora Martin and Rick Testa escaped the New England blizzards and eloped in Vieques, Puerto Rico, on Thursday." -- Sandy Malone 9 "Jurich and Glenecia braving the rain for intimate wedding portraits in between rows of hops in the Waboomskraal Valley, South Africa." -- Ruan Redelinghuys 10 "Jennifer and Michael were married this Friday in a sunset ceremony in front of the fireplace at the Farm at Ridgeway with reception in the barn." -- Katie Hart 11 "Jennifer and Brad were married at La Concha Resort in the heart of Puerto Rico's vibrant capital city of San Juan. Congratulations to the happy couple!" -- Frances Davis 12 "Tony and Amanda had a beautiful mountaintop wedding at Fontaine Vineyards in Leicester, North Carolina." -- Mike Rice 13 Missy Fant Photography "Jesse and Shannon got married at the Stone Cliff Inn in Carver, Oregon." -- Missy Fant If you go to a wedding or get married yourself, hashtag your photos #HPrealweddings or e-mail one to us afterward and we may feature it on the site! Please include the coupleâ€™s names as well as the date and location of the wedding. For more real wedding photos, check out the slideshow below: Also on HuffPost Real Weddings of the Week 2015 Real Weddings of the Week 2015 1
